alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 10:12PM CDT until March 24 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River At Centreville affecting Bibb, Perry and Dallas Counties. .Heavy rainfall over the last 24 hours will cause rises over the Cahaba River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Cahaba River near Centreville. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cahaba River At Centreville. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Pasture lands begin to flood in the Centreville area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning to a crest of 26.8 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
